Monterey_Park.Rosemead High School: Rosemead High School is a secondary school located at 9063 East Mission Drive in Rosemead, California, in the ZIP Code 91770. It is a secondary school in the El Monte Union High School District. The campus, which is adjacent to a city park and pool, has 80 classrooms and a full-time certificated staff of 82 who provide support for approximately 1900 students.
